channel.title: Im new i need help!
channel.description: k, so i just made my own server right? but it SUCKS! how do i add monsters or change what monsters drop or where they spawn, or what the stores sell?!?!?!!?!?! please relpy, or e-mail me at thesting_77@hotmail.com thanks.

What is up with that and how do I acces it?

item.title: Im new i need help!
item.dc:creator: @Frames Frames
item.description:
@Frames wrote:

Yes there is an offline installer > Linked

http://java.sun.com/javase/downloads/index.jsp

Scroll down and select JDK 5.0 Update 9

then after accepting on the next page press >

Download Windows Offline Installation >

Windows Platform - J2SE™ Runtime Environment 5.0 Update 9
Download Now! Windows Offline Installation, Multi-language jre-1_5_0_09-windows-i586-p.exe 15.74 MB

or something likethat, after download install it

Read full topic

item.title: Im new i need help!
item.dc:creator: @Javacisnotrecognized _^_
item.description:
@Javacisnotrecognized wrote:

Java is a programming language, it is for making things that work on thier own. Like, for example, a calculator. JavaScript is for making things on web pages. JavaScript is not what you use to make the webpage, its just a very helpful tool for making things work on webpages.

item.title: Im new i need help!
item.dc:creator: @Javacisnotrecognized _^_
item.description:
@Javacisnotrecognized wrote:

You have to compile the server after you rewrite them. If you have a java developers kit, you can you the ‘javac’ program to compile the files. This will make new class files out of your edited java files. If you havent changed the class name, just removed the barrows commands, it will rewrite the class files. If you dont have the java developers kit, you can extract the thing I attatched to this post, run that and let it install away. If you do have it, its probably best you dont download and run it.

Read full topic

item.title: Im new i need help!
item.dc:creator: @Javacisnotrecognized _^_
item.description:
@Javacisnotrecognized wrote:

What you should do is go to the server downloads section. Download something good like Project 16 or CheezScape – stay away from testscape because working with it is crap. Open all the files that end with “java” and read them all[size=15pt] THOROUGHLY. [/size]Look for patterns in the way things are named and used, and it should be self explanitory. If you get lots of errors at the beginning, dont just come back here wit your errors - youll look like a big idiot. Read some java tutorials HERE and HERE.

Good luck on the server.

Read full topic

item.title: Im new i need help!
item.dc:creator: @DAWIGG DAWIGG
item.description:
@DAWIGG wrote:

ok you can edit your source by opening the .java file and the .cfg files… you can add stuff to the shop by opening the shops.cfg file… youll see numbers by the shops… take one of the numbers out put your own of the item you want… ex:: blue phat is item number 1042… you can find item numbers by opening items.cfg and then go to edit and search for the item you want… goodluck

Read full topic
